content.title: Implementing Logout
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor left menu, under the Network section, select Invoke Service.
  2. From the right pane of the Action Editor, for Select Service drop-down, select UserAuthentication$logout.
  3. On the Action Editor canvas, select Success.
  4. From the Action Editor left menu, under the General section, select Navigate to Form.
  5. From the right pane of the Action Editor, select frmLogin.
  6. Click Save.
